features: Padded internal compartment that fits up to a 15” laptop
Water-resistant zipper to keep water out
Wide top zipper opening allows you to easily pack and access your gear
Adjustable padded straps are lined with breathable mesh fabric to keep you cool
Removable chest strap to ensure shoulder straps stay where you want them
Discreet exterior zipper pocket for quick access to important items
Stretch exterior water bottle pocket fits up to a 1L bottle (33.8oz)
Internal compartments that easily adjust allowing you to customize how you carry your gear
Internal mesh pockets allow for wet gear to breathe
Internal zipper pocket with hidden quick access for important items you need to find fast.
